Articles.Content:
I was getting MechJeb to help me do a plotted landing at my Kethane mining munbase, "Muthane", to deliver my Muthane Mining Unit. I rotated my map view to see its side of the planet, and I saw this.

I jumped a few metres up off of my pooper, until I realised it was probably because of that wierd MechJeb easter egg I had on (Bottom left of the screen).
I think that's the mechjeb, I saw a thread from before the crash where people saw that...
This is the true mask of the kraken! This is one that causes our rockets to randomly reach ridcoulous speed or randomly explode. This is trolken.

If you think about it, the Space Kraken is the ultimate troll. Just when you think you got to Eeloo with your huge mothership intact, it strikes, leaving a huge field of ship debris and dead kerbals flying through space. Then:
